New Records: DeMar DeRozan scored 30 points, including nine in double overtime, to help the Sacramento Kings win.
Domantas Sabonis recorded a triple-double with 21 points, 18 rebounds, and 11 assists.
Key Match Events: The game went into double overtime after both teams failed to score in the final 50 seconds of regulation.
DeMar DeRozan hit three key shots in the second overtime to secure the win.
Neither team scored in the final 50 seconds of regulation, leading to overtime.
Malik Monk made two clutch free throws in the second overtime to send the game to double overtime.
Post-Match Reflections: Sacramento improved to 5-1 since firing coach Mike Brown with the win.
